thread.title: Rogers Communications' quarterly profit rises 37 pct

title: Rogers Communications' quarterly profit rises 37 pct
text:
April 19, 2018 / 8:07 PM / Updated 3 minutes ago Rogers Communications' quarterly profit rises 37 pct Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 19 (Reuters) - Rogers Communications Incâ€™s first-quarter profit rose 37 percent as the Canadian cable and telecom company signed up more wireless postpaid and internet customers. 
Toronto-based Rogers said on Thursday its net income rose to C$425 million ($335.7 million) or 80 Canadian cents per share in the three months ended March 31, from C$310 million or 60 Canadian cents per share a year earlier. 
Revenue rose to C$3.63 billion from C$3.37 billion. ($1 = 1.2661 Canadian dollars) (Reporting by Anirban Paul in Bengaluru; Editing by Sai Sachin Ravikumar)
